sentences.sContent: By November, after all, it will be more than a year since the global crisis began in the US, and Obama and his team must show tangible prospects for recovery.
sentences.sContent_eng: By November, after all, it will be more than a year since the global crisis began in the US, and Obama and his team must show tangible prospects for recovery.
sentences.sCn: 毕竟，到了十一月时，自全球性金融危机在美国爆发以来，已经过去一年多了。 奥巴马和他的团队必须展现出经济复苏的切实前景。

trans.tranOther: the 11th month of the year, between October and December
